title: Ownership Structure of Arch Capital Group Ltd

content.text:
As of the latest available data, institutional investors hold a significant portion of Arch Capital Group Ltd stock. Among the major institutional shareholders are:

1. The Vanguard Group, Inc. - This investment management company holds approximately 9.03% of the total shares outstanding.

2. BlackRock, Inc. - Another prominent institutional investor, BlackRock, Inc. owns around 8.29% of the company's stock.

3. State Street Corporation - With a stake of approximately 7.01%, State Street Corporation is also a significant institutional shareholder of Arch Capital Group Ltd.

Insiders, including executives, directors, and employees of Arch Capital Group Ltd, also have a notable ownership stake in the company. As of the latest data:

1. Constantine Iordanou - The Chairman and CEO of Arch Capital Group Ltd, Constantine Iordanou, owns around 1.52% of the company's stock.

2. Marc Grandisson - The President and CEO of Arch Capital Group Ltd, Marc Grandisson, holds approximately 0.76% of the total shares outstanding.
